dwife will discuss 
various tests you will 
be	offered	during	your	
pregnancy, one of which is 
an ultrasound scan to check 
for certain conditions in your 
baby (see page 66). You 
will	be	offered	information	
about what to expect during 
pregnancy and how to have a 
healthy pregnancy. Ask if you 
are unsure about anything.
• Your midwife will also discuss 
the	whooping	cough,	flu	and	
COVID-19 vaccines which 
are	offered	to	all	pregnant	
women.
